dict.string: ### Requires Keyboard Maestro 8.0.3+ ### set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE" tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" set kmExecutingThisMacroUUID to getvariable "local_ExecutingThisMacroUUID" instance kmInst set kmWithParameter to getvariable "local_WithParameter" instance kmInst end tell tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" do script kmExecutingThisMacroUUID with parameter kmWithParameter end tell

dict.string: Something went wrong. '%ExecutingThisMacro%' was unable to determine the most recently executed macros.

set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE" tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" set kmUUID to getvariable "local_MreUUID" instance kmInst end tell tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" do script kmUUID end tell
Open the macro in the Keyboard Maestro editor
